title: How to Access Your .Minecraft Folder on the Computer

steps.title: Click ".
steps.content: Click ". minecraft". This should be in the address bar at the top of the new window that opened. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Choose the folder you wish to access.
steps.content: Choose the folder you wish to access.

steps.title: Press ⊞ Win + R.
steps.content: Press ⊞ Win + R . A new small window in the bottom left corner of your screen will appear. This program is called "Run" and it allows you to start things up on your computer. [2] X Research source Keep in mind that you don't have to download it, it will be a default program on your computer. Alternatively, you could drag your mouse to the top right corner of the screen and drag down to open up the panel. Then, click "Search" and type in "Run".

steps.title: Type %appdata% in the box.
steps.content: Type %appdata% in the box. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Choose the folder you wish to access.
steps.content: Choose the folder you wish to access. You can download Optifine for Minecraft. [4] X Research source It provides access to a wider variety of texture packs with special features that change the look of the world. [5] X Research source It also offers new actions and cosmetic features that give Minecraft a cleaner look. [6] X Research source
